import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faHeart } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faThumbsDown } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import NavBar from "../components/layout/Navbar"; import "./details.css"; import icecream from "../image/bg.avif"; import { BiLike, BiDislike, BiComment } from 'react-icons/bi'; const Details = ({ post, category, comments }) => { const [commentNumber, setCommentNumber] = useState(comments.length); const [likeStatus, setLikeStatus] = useState(null); const [likeNumber, setLikeNumber] = useState(post.likeNumber); const [dislikeNumber, setDislikeNumber] = useState(post.dislikeNumber); const handleLike = () => { setLikeStatus((prevStatus) => (prevStatus === "like"? null : "like")); setLikeNumber((prevNumber) => prevNumber + 1); }; const handleDislike = () => { setLikeStatus((prevStatus) => prevStatus === "dislike"? null : "dislike" ); setDislikeNumber((prevNumber) => prevNumber + 1); }; return (
{/* ======= Breadcrumbs ======= */}

{post.title}

  1. Home
  2. {post.category.name}
{/* End Breadcrumbs */}

{post.title}

{post.details}

{commentNumber}

{likeNumber}

{dislikeNumber}

{comments.map((comment, index) => (
setLikeStatus((prevStatus) => prevStatus === "like"? null : "like" ) } /> {comment.likedNumber}
setLikeStatus((prevStatus) => prevStatus === "dislike"? null : "dislike" ) } /> {comment.dislikedNumber}
{comment.date}

{comment.text}

))}

  • {cat.name} {cat.postNumber}

); }; export default Details;
